ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: you are right.....i know i was poor then....i had to save every cp i got.....saved for a good while just to buy banded at that level....wasn t in a guild till
ygData.messageBody:
you are right.....i know i was poor then....i had to save every cp i
got.....saved for a good while just to buy banded at that level....wasn't in a
guild till later, but it was a pain.....at least what i did was try to get in
good groups in unrest.....that helped with some stuff like the savant's cap, but
as for the bronze, i couldn't wear it <darn small sizes....> but if you're in a
good group in unrest, they will do a split and stuff like that...giving you the
bronze weapons and money that they get....i;d say go to unrest at lv 15
maybe....some of the yard trash has been known to sport bronze weapons on
occassion.... (;

The Scotts wrote:

> From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>
>

> JSUT LUCKY BUT BUT ITS A KNOWN FACT CLERICS ARE ALWAYS IN POVERTY AT LOWER
> LVLSL.
